page.title: 17Burton Life Styles
page.content: On the questionnaires there was a section on Life Style.Some of the questions were,Where do you do your main shopping? What kind of electrical appliances do you have? Do you use the bus service?When we looked through the questionnaires we saw that nearly everyone had a fridge and a washing machine but not many people had microwaves,dishwashers or videos.There were 1 or 2 people who said that they did their main shopping in Doncaster but most people shopped at Scunthorpe. The bus service isn't very popular with most people because they said it was expensive and rather infrequent.It was interesting to see what the people had written down for they all wrote different things.There was a question that asked people what they would miss the most,most people said they would miss their washing machine the most.
